column4: hi everyone I'm trying to disable bluetooth at bootup and I've blacklisted hci_usb in /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist with no effect, I've googled it a bit and eems to be a common problem I just can't seem to find a work around
anyone have any ideas, I'm using 8.10
could someone explain to me how to disable the bluetooth kernel module in 8.10?
you need to add the name of the module to /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist
